name: hm04
effect: Teaches Strength to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Strength to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Builds enormous
power, then slams
the foe.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Builds enormous
power, then slams
the foe.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
The foe is slugged
at maximum power.
Can also be used
to move boulders.

to move boulders.
